name: PUNKSIM
description:
As a kid, punk rock can remind you that it's ok to break rules, and it's ok to make art that isn't polished. But as the years go on you also learn that the punk world is full of ignorance and hypocrisy, just like the regular world.

PUNKSIM combines a worse-is-better design ethos with the jaded indifference that can only come from years of being punk. Original images by Electronic Arts, altered with Airtight ImageGlitcher. No rights reserved.

Play in-browser at http://0ames.neocities.org/punksim.html
